mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NICKNAME, USER_TEL, USER_EMAIL, TO_CHAR(USER_ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') USER_ENROLL_DT, USER_AMOUNT, USER_ROLE, USER_RATING, USER_CLOSE, USER_BIRTH, USER_GENDER FROM "USER_INFO" WHERE USER_CLOSE = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "USER_INFO" WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_CLOSE = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "USER_INFO" WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND USER_CLOSE = 'N'
